about_the_game:
Become a Celia has she tries to survive the workday.

Demo version consists of the first half of Act 1 out of 3 that will be in the full game, dealing with one BIRA task involving Mr. Mark and encountering Ms. Darcy in the neutral route.  It lasts around 20-25 minutes.

Demo Features:

  • 3 Main Endings with Mr. Mark

  • 2 hidden endings

  • Few events like running into Ms. Darcy

  • 3 self-care features

  • 2 fully animated cutscenes

  • Demo will be updated regularly till Act 1 is fully polished

Work-life balance doesn't exist for those deemed lesser. Survive the work day as a Afro-Latina woman . Maintain your mental health or face being sent to HR.

Celia, an Afro-Latina woman, who is trying to survive another day at work. You need to clock out early but the company culture won't allow it.

To make matters worse, ever since the “incident” and you’ve been seeing strange and terrifying creatures.

Is It Real? Or Is the Stress Getting to You?

Make it to the end of the day while balancing your mental health or face being sent to HR.

content_descriptors.notes:
Mild Violence: Includes implied or emotional violence related to workplace interactions.

Fantasy Violence: Includes supernatural and horror elements

Mild Language: Use of mild language and derogatory terms within the context of workplace interactions.

Sexual Themes: Depictions of sexism, gender discrimination, and inappropriate workplace behavior.

Discrimination: Depictions of racism, microaggressions, and identity struggles.

Harassment: Includes scenarios of workplace harassment, both verbal and non-verbal.

Mental Health: Themes related to stress, anxiety, depression, and job insecurity.

Mature Themes: Exploration of emotional abuse, gaslighting, and the psychological impact of being marginalized.

Isolation: Includes feelings of isolation, loneliness, and cultural struggles.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • Storage: 4 MB available space

name: Clock Out at 2 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.6 Ghz Quad Core
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

short_description: Clock Out at 2 is a visual novel in which you have to survive inside the corporate machine known as the "workplace". Eat fast food. Drink lots of espressos. Experience microaggressions. Pray they don't fire you.
